DOC.brief_summary: A 24-month, placebo controlled, double dummy, parallel-design outpatient trial in generally healthy elderly men and women who are at risk of becoming frail.
DOC.brief_title: Effects Of An Oral Growth Hormone Secretagogue In Older Functionally Limited Adults
DOC.criteria: 6584 years old, BMI < 30, at risk for functional decline based on SF36, Instrumental Activities of Daily Living (per Nagy's), or 2 or more falls in prior 2 years Significant history or symptoms of acute medical conditions, currently in an exercise program, pain or other conditions that would prevent participating in exercise testing
